name: A K S H A Y K U M A R

full_output.summary: Experienced Full Stack Software Developer adept in bringing forth expertise in design, installation, testing and maintenance of software systems. Experienced with the latest cutting edge development tools and procedures specifically in Web Development. Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects, as well as collaborate as part of a productive team.

projects.name: Book Store Website
projects.description: Developed in MERN Stack Users can create, update, read and delete books Users can retrieve the books in two viewing modes Atomic Design structure throughout the project

projects.name: Diet recommendation app
projects.description: Developed in Next Js, Firebase Users can monitor IgE Mediated Food Triggers Users can track the impact of their food items based on their medical condition Uses scoring system to rate the severity of the impact

projects.name: Microsoft Website Clone
projects.description: Developed in HTML5, CSS3 and Javascript Fully Responsive website Clone of the Microsoft's home page Responsive with different screen sizes and devices
